contentList.content: Project a cone of colorful lights, potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> targets. Targets with more hitpoints are more likely to resist this spell.

Targets below [1] are always Blinded.
Targets below [2] have Disadvantage on their Saving Throws against this spell.
Targets above [3] have Advantage on their Saving Throws against this spell.
Targets above [4] will not be Blinded.
Attempt to send targets into magical slumber. Targets with more hitpoints are more likely to resist this spell.

Targets below [1] are always put to Sleep.
Targets below [2] have Disadvantage on their Saving Throws against this spell.
Targets above [3] have Advantage on their Saving Throws against this spell.
Targets above [4] will not be put to Sleep.
Increases chance of success against healthier enemies at higher levels.
Gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>. While you have these temporary hitpoints, all damage taken is reduced by [2].
Gained [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>. While you have these temporary hitpoints, all damage taken is reduced by [2].
Triple a creature's jumping distance. If cast out of combat, all allies within [1] will gain the effect as well.
